content: In the IPS IG we're still getting a pretty large number of The Implementation Guide contains no explicitly linked examples for this profile information messages. But I believe for all of the ones that are generating the messages (I haven't checked every instance yet) we do have an explicit link to an example instance declared in ImplementationGuide.definition.resource.exampleCanonical. At one point after this started to be checked we had all of these messages resolved, but then they reappeared. I'm not seeing other warnings or errors suggesting that something is invalid. So I'm not sure why these messages are being generated? @Grahame Grieve @Lloyd McKenzie?
